name: Anas Samran

Current role as manager suggests decision-making authority for support tools and processes. Company size likely falls within target range given Eastnets' global presence in financial technology. Career progression from technical support to management roles demonstrates operational leadership experience where resolution efficiency and knowledge management would be critical pain points.

ITIL framework expertise and support journey optimization

Strong team leadership and management skills demonstrated across roles

Focus on how your solution can help streamline their support operations and improve team efficiency. Mention specific aspects of their background that align with your offering, such as ITIL compliance or multilingual support capabilities.
personalization: Reference their current role as Technical Support Manager at Eastnets
Mention their ITIL experience from Microsoft role
Note their multilingual capabilities as a valuable asset
Connect to their product management background at Orange
Reference their technical support experience across Cisco, Microsoft, and Amazon
Acknowledge their team management progression from Team Manager at Amazon to current role

enriched_data.content: Technical Support Manager at Eastnets with experience at Amazon, Estarta Solutions, Microsoft, Orange, and Cisco. Bachelor's degree from Princess Sumaya University for Technology. Multilingual: Arabic, French, English, Spanish, Italian.
